content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Since 2016, through our journey, we have trained well over 400 software developers in Nigeria. From our Switch Innovation to transitioning into Univelcity, our impact can be seen in the numerous young lives that have been transformed and many have been lifted out of Extreme poverty.

Although our training is a paid program, we started out with a freemium model because our primary objective is to accelerate tech talent development across Africa to meet the growing demand for talent across the world. we continued to support more that 30% of our student annually with either discounted tuition or outright scholarship.

However, we think we can achieve more with your help, and, that is why we are calling on you to support us by sponsoring a student or a group of student to one of our two(2) programs today.

You might be wondering what impact will your sponsorship have in their lives.
Over 70% of graduates from Univelcity gets into an employment in their first 3 Months after training and this student do not only get out of poverty they go ahead to do same to at least two (2) of their family members within the first two (2)years of getting a job.

If you sponsor a student we will send you their recorded story in a Video format and a portrait picture of them in the class learning.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][pff-paystack id=”1832″][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
